types.html:
fouette-cul m (plural fouette-cul or fouette-culs)

  1. a person in charge of administering discipline by serious spankings, as once done to pupils in French Catholic schools by a priest
trans: a person in charge of administering discipline by serious spankings, as once done to pupils in French Catholic schools by a priest

title: fouette-cul
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fwɛt.ky/
